__e: It is true I could sometimes have wished my father kinder, not for myself, but for George.
I mean, that's what he is, even if I wanted it to be more at one point.
Really. That day you came to my house, seeing you... I just wanted everything to be like it was again.
Because I always wanted a girl, and I always imagined we'd share girl stuff.
And I told you I really wanted to have a daughter you know?
Didn't you ever want to have a home of your own like other people?
I've always wanted to do what you do.
That's what you've always wanted to do, so I just gave you an easy excuse.
It's all I ever wanted to do. I never wanted to do anything else.
It is what it is, but I have always wanted to be a mother, and I think I'd be a pretty damn good one, too.
- I mean, face it... she has always partly wanted to be you.
The thing you didn't realize is that I looked up to you, like, the whole time, huh?
Let's have your nightcap. It's getting late.
Been wanting a job like this in a place like this for, well, as long as I can remember.
Said that she's always wanted some of this, and, you know what?
In all my life, it's the one wish that I've truly wanted.
Do you know, there wasn't a single thing about being with you that I didn't want more of?
Haven't you ever wanted to be a part of something bigger than you?
